name: Dr. Brain Thinking Games IQ Adventures
storyline:
The Ultimate Games for Your Brain!
Well, that's what you keep telling yourself. This time Dr. Brain has accidentally transported you to a strange world filled with plant people, molemen, and angry robots! Now you've got to use all of your smarts to locate and reassemble the fragmented pieces of the transporter that brought you here, and find a way back home.
summary: In IQ Adventure, you have to find and use objects to restore a trans-dimensional device that has trapped you in a strange dimension.
